        M.state.weather.cw.description[0] = 'Пасмурно, без осадков';</script><script>M.state.abtests.tests = [{"disabled":false,"version":"V1","name":"NG-1049","audience":{"test":[1,5],"control":[51,55]}}];
        const range = (abtest) => {
            const isTestGroup = abtest.audience.test[0] <= M.state.abtests.group && M.state.abtests.group <= abtest.audience.test[1]
            const isControlGroup = abtest.audience.control[0] <= M.state.abtests.group && M.state.abtests.group <= abtest.audience.control[1]

            return {
                isTestGroup,
                isControlGroup
            }
        };
        const group = (abtest) => {
            if (!abtest) {
                return 'default'
            }
            const { isTestGroup, isControlGroup } = range(abtest)

            return isTestGroup ? 'test' : isControlGroup ? 'control' : 'default'
        }
        M.state.abtests.current = M.state.abtests.tests.find(abtest => {
            const { isTestGroup, isControlGroup } = range(abtest)
            return isTestGroup || isControlGroup
        })
        M.state.abtests.abGroup = group(M.state.abtests.current)</script><script>window.yaContextCb = window.yaContextCb || []

    window.ym = window.ym || function () {
        (window.ym.a = window.ym.a || []).push(arguments)
    }

    window.ga = window.ga || function () {
        (window.ga.q = window.ga.q || []).push(arguments)
    }

    window.googletag = window.googletag || { cmd: [] }
    window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || []

    if (window.gtag === undefined) {
        function gtag() {
            dataLayer.push(arguments)
        }
    }</script><script>window.M.Storage={getItem(t){try{return localStorage.getItem(t)}catch{return null}},setItem(t,e){try{localStorage.setItem(t,e)}catch{}},setObject(t,e){try{localStorage.setItem(t,JSON.stringify(e))}catch{}},getArray(t){let e=[];try{e=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(t))}catch(r){console.error(r)}return Array.isArray(e)?e:[]},_getItem(t){const e=new RegExp("(?:^|; )"+t.replace(/([\.$?*|{}\(\)\[\]\\\/\+^])/g,"\\$1")+"=([^;]*)");try{const r=document.cookie.match(e);return r?decodeURIComponent(r[1]):""}catch{return""}}};(()=>{var r;const t="recently-viewed",e=window.M.state;if((r=e.city)!=null&&r.id)try{let n=window.M.Storage.getArray(t).filter(o=>o.id!==e.city.id);n.unshift(e.city),n=n.slice(0,5),window.M.Storage.setObject(t,n)}catch(n){console.error(n)}})();window.M.fn.getSectionName=()=>window.M.state.app.weatherType;window.M.fn.getWindowWidth=()=>window.innerWidth;window.M.fn.getColumnsQty=()=>{const t=document.querySelectorAll("main .content-column");return[].filter.call(t,function(r){return window.getComputedStyle(r).display!=="none"}).length};window.M.fn.getABGroup=()=>window.M.state.abtests.abGroup;

            M.state.advert.puids = {
                'puid1': 7,'puid15': 1,'puid17': 0,'puid2': 'cloud','puid10': 9,'puid20': 1,'puid22': 0,'puid23': 0,'puid24': 0,'puid25': 0,'puid27': 6,'puid28': 0,'puid3': 4079,'puid4': 156,'puid6': 4147,'puid8': 'M.fn.getABGroup()','puid13': window.M.fn.getSectionName(),'puid19': 'M.fn.getColumnsQty()','puid21': 'M.fn.getWindowWidth()','puid18': 'gismeteo_ru_new_desktop',
            }
        } catch (e) {
            console.error(e)
        }</script><script>try {
            (function (w) {
                w.yaContextCb = w.yaContextCb || []
                var localTimeParams = (function () {
                    var dd = new Date()
                    return {
                        pt: 'b',
                        pd: dd.getDate(),
                        pw: dd.getDay(),
                        pv: dd.getHours()
                    }
                })()

                M.fn.callAd = function (id, method, mainParams, botParams, callbacks) {
                    w.yaContextCb.push(function () {
                        var params = {
                            ownerId: 235076,
                            containerId: id
                        }
                        if (typeof callbacks === 'object') {
                            params = { ...params, ...callbacks }
                        }
                        Ya.adfoxCode[method]({
                            ...params,
                            params: { ...mainParams, ...localTimeParams, ...M.state.advert.puids }
                        })
                    })
                }
            })(window)
        } catch (e) {
            console.error(e)
        }</script><script>try {
        (function (w) {
            w.yaContextCb = w.yaContextCb || []
            var localTimeParams = (function () {
                var dd = new Date()
                return {
                    pt: 'b',
                    pd: dd.getDate(),
                    pw: dd.getDay(),
                    pv: dd.getHours()
                }
            })()

            M.fn.callAd = M.fn.callAd || function (id, method, mainParams, botParams, callbacks) {
                w.yaContextCb.push(function () {
                    var params = {
                        ownerId: 235076,
                        containerId: id
                    }
                    if (typeof callbacks === 'object') {
                        params = { ...params, ...callbacks }
                    }
                    Ya.adfoxCode[method]({
                        ...params,
                        params: { ...mainParams, ...localTimeParams, ...M.state.advert.puids }
                    })
                })
            }
        })(window)

        console.error(e)

        const sprites = [ 'sprite-weather-v3', 'sprite-ui', 'sprite-widget' ]
        if ([ 'catalog', 'search' ].includes(M.state.app.project)) {
            sprites.push('sprite-flags')

        var measureUnits=function(n){"use strict";var B=Object.defineProperty;var k=n=>{throw TypeError(n)};var L=(n,u,o)=>u in n?B(n,u,{enumerable:!0,configurable:!0,writable:!0,value:o}):n[u]=o;var a=(n,u,o)=>L(n,typeof u!="symbol"?u+"":u,o),w=(n,u,o)=>u.has(n)||k("Cannot "+o);var d=(n,u,o)=>(w(n,u,"read from private field"),o?o.call(n):u.get(n)),g=(n,u,o)=>u.has(n)?k("Cannot add the same private member more than once"):u instanceof WeakSet?u.add(n):u.set(n,o),S=(n,u,o,h)=>(w(n,u,"write to private field"),h?h.call(n,o):u.set(n,o),o);var l,f;const p=class p extends HTMLElement{constructor(e,s,r){super();a(this,"value",null);a(this,"fromUnit",null);a(this,"toUnit",null);a(this,"reactive",null);a(this,"showUnits",null);a(this,"dictUnitPrefix",null);a(this,"units");a(this,"formulas");a(this,"controller");a(this,"controllerUnit",null);a(this,"unsubscribe");this.units=e,this.formulas=s,this.controller=r,this.render()}attributeChangedCallback(e,s,r){switch(e){case"value":{const c=parseFloat(r);if(Number.isNaN(c)){p.invalidValue("value",r);return}this.value=c;break}case"from-unit":{if(!this.isKnownUnit(r)){p.invalidValue("unit",r);return}this.fromUnit=r;break}case"to-unit":{if(!this.isKnownUnit(r)){p.invalidValue("unit",r);return}this.toUnit=r;break}case"reactive":{const c=this.reactive,m=r===""||r==="true";!c&&m?(this.unsubscribe=this.controller.subscribe(T=>{this.controllerUnit=T,this.render()},!0),this.reactive=!0):c&&!m&&(this.unsubscribe(),this.unsubscribe=void 0,this.reactive=!1);break}case"show-units":{this.showUnits=r===""||r==="true";break}case"dict-unit-prefix":{this.dictUnitPrefix=r||null;break}default:return}this.render()}static invalidValue(e,s){console.error(`"${s}" is not a valid value for "${e}" attribute`)}isKnownUnit(e){return this.units.includes(e)}disconnectedCallback(){var e;this.reactive&&((e=this.unsubscribe)==null||e.call(this))}get targetUnit(){return this.reactive&&this.controllerUnit!==null?this.controllerUnit:!this.reactive&&this.toUnit!==null?this.toUnit:this.fromUnit}formatValue(e,s){return Math.round(e).toString()}spaceBetween(){return!0}valueToString(){if(this.value===null||this.fromUnit===null)return"";const e=this.formulas.toBaseUnit[this.fromUnit](this.value),s=this.formulas.fromBaseUnit[this.targetUnit](e);return this.formatValue(s,this.targetUnit)}unitToString(){if(!this.showUnits)return"";const e=this.targetUnit,s=this.dictUnitPrefix?`${this.dictUnitPrefix}_${e}`:e;return window.M.state.dictionary.measureUnits[s]}render(){const e=this.valueToString(),s=this.unitToString(),c=this.spaceBetween()&&!!e&&!!s?"&nbsp;":"";this.innerHTML=`${e}${c}${s}`}};a(p,"observedAttributes",["value","from-unit","to-unit","reactive","show-units","dict-unit-prefix"]);let u=p;const o={speed:["ms","kmh","mph"],temperature:["c","f"],pressure:["mmhg","hpa"]},h={isSpeedUnit:t=>o.speed.includes(t),isTemperatureUnit:t=>o.temperature.includes(t),isPressureUnit:t=>o.pressure.includes(t)},U={speed:{toBaseUnit:{ms:t=>t,kmh:t=>t/3.6,mph:t=>t/2.23694},fromBaseUnit:{ms:t=>t,kmh:t=>t*3.6,mph:t=>t*2.23694}},temperature:{toBaseUnit:{c:t=>t,f:t=>(t-32)/1.8},fromBaseUnit:{c:t=>t,f:t=>t*1.8+32}},pressure:{toBaseUnit:{mmhg:t=>t,hpa:t=>t/1.333},fromBaseUnit:{mmhg:t=>t,hpa:t=>t*1.333}}};class v{constructor(i){g(this,l);g(this,f,new Set);S(this,l,i)}get current(){return d(this,l)}set current(i){i!==d(this,l)&&(S(this,l,i),d(this,f).forEach(e=>e(i)))}subscribe(i,e=!1){return d(this,f).add(i),e&&i(d(this,l)),()=>{d(this,f).delete(i)}}}l=new WeakMap,f=new WeakMap;class M{constructor(){a(this,"LS_KEY","measure-units");a(this,"speed",new v("ms"));a(this,"temperature",new i=e=>s=>{document.body.setAttribute(e,s)};this.speed.subscribe(i("data-speed-unit"),!0),this.temperature.subscribe(i("data-temperature-unit"),!0),this.pressure.subscribe(i("data-pressure-unit"),!0)}syncLocalStorage(){const i=()=>{const e=[this.speed.current,this.temperature.current,this.pressure.current].join("|");try{localStorage.setItem(this.LS_KEY,e)}catch{}};this.speed.subscribe(i),this.temperature.subscribe(i),this.pressure.subscribe(i)}parseUnitsSetFromString(i){const e={};for(const s of i.split("|").filter(r=>!!r))h.isSpeedUnit(s)?e.speed=s:h.isTemperatureUnit(s)?e.temperature=s:h.isPressureUnit(s)?e.pressure=s:console.error(`Unknown unit: ${s}`);return e}migrateOldCookieIfExists(){const i=this.readCookie("measure"),e=this.readCookie("measure_units");i&&this.removeCookie("measure"),e&&this.removeCookie("measure_units");const s=i||e;if(!s)return;const c=s.split("|").filter(m=>!!m).map(m=>m.toLowerCase().replace("_","").trim()).join("|");try{localStorage.setItem(this.LS_KEY,c)}catch{}}readCookie(i){try{const e=new RegExp("(?:^|; )"+i.replace(/([\.$?*|{}\(\)\[\]\\\/\+^])/g,"\\$1")+"=([^;]*)"),s=document.cookie.match(e);return(s?decodeURIComponent(s[1]):"").trim()}catch{return""}}removeCookie(i){try{const e=new Date;e.setTime(e.getTime()+-36e5);const s=e.toUTCString(),r=[i+"="];r.push("expires="+s),r.push("path=/"),r.push("domain="+location.hostname),document.cookie=r.join(";")}catch{}}}window.M.MeasureUnits=window.M.MeasureUnits||new M;const b=window.M.MeasureUnits;class y extends u{constructor(){super(o.speed,U.speed,b.speed)}}class C extends u{constructor(){super(o.temperature,U.temperature,b.temperature)}formatValue(i,e){const s=Math.round(i),r=Math.abs(s);let c="";return s<0?c="&minus;":e==="c"&&s>0&&(c="&plus;"),`${c}${r}`}spaceBetween(){return!1}}class E extends     })()</script><div class="mobile-switch-notify js-platform-switcher" data-platform="mobile"><div class="notify-wrap"><div class="notify-btn mobile-version js-mobile-version">Перейти на мобильную версию</div><div class="notify-btn close js-notify-close"><svg viewBox="0 0 20 20" width="50" height="50"><use href="#close"/></svg></div></div></div><script>(() => {

                const moreButton = document.querySelector('.js-more')

                if (moreButton) {
                    const expand = () => {
                        moreButton.setAttribute('aria-expanded', 'true')
                        window.addEventListener('click', collapse)
                    }

                    const collapse = (e) => {
                        if (e.target === moreButton) {
                            return
                        }

                        moreButton.setAttribute('aria-expanded', 'false')
                        window.removeEventListener('click', collapse)
                    }

                    moreButton.addEventListener('click', expand)
                }
            })()</script></div></div></div></header><main class="content wrap"><div class="content-column" data-column="C1" data-cid="651fda3050241b0ddbdb1701"><section class="section section-content" style="" data-column-place="C1P1" data-bid="651fda3050241b0ddbdb1702" data-ab-group="default"><div class="page-title-wrap"><div class="page-title-left"><script type="application/ld+json">{
        "@context": "https://schema.org",
        "@type": "BreadcrumbList",
        "itemListElement": [
            
                {
                    "@type": "ListItem",
                    "position": "1",
                    "name": "Россия",
                    "item": "https://www.gismeteo.ru/catalog/russia/"

                    "@type": "ListItem",

                },

                    "@type": "ListItem",
                    "position": "3",

                }

Распечатать...</button><script>const node = document.querySelector('.js-print')
    if (node) {
        node.addEventListener('click', () => {
            window.print()
        })
    }</script></div><script>(() => {
            const params = M.Storage.getArray('dataset')
            if (!params.length) {
                params.push('icon-tooltip', 'temperature-air', 'wind-gust', 'precipitation-bars')
            }
            if (M.state.app.weatherType === 'new-year') {
                return
            }
            const rows = [].slice.call(document.querySelectorAll('.js-dataset .widget-items [data-row]'))

            rows.forEach(item => {
                if (!params.includes(item.getAttribute('data-row'))) {
                    item.classList.add('is-hide')
                }
            })
        })()</script><script>(() => {
            const precipitation = M.Storage.getItem('precipitation')
            
            if (precipitation === 'new') {
                const row = document.querySelector('.js-dataset.widget-days .widget-row-precipitation-bars')
                row?.classList.add('is-extended')
            }
        })()</script></section><section class="section section-media" style="" data-column-place="C1P4" data-bid="651fda3050241b0ddbdb1705" data-ab-group="default"><div class="placeholder h240" data-stat-type="media" data-stat-value="6194cba75e2e9c3135955759"><div id="media-middle"></div><script>M.fn.callAd('media-middle', 'createScroll', {p1:'bvvmu',p2:'fllx'}, {p1:'ctqyu',p2:'fllx'});</script></div></section><section class="section section-rss section-hidden" style="" data-column-place="C1P5" data-bid="6544c8f62a112d1599d69c5f" data-ab-group="default"><div data-cid="651fda3050241b0ddbdb1708"><section class="section section-media" style="" data-column-place="C2P1" data-bid="651fda3050241b0ddbdb1709" data-ab-group="default"><div class="placeholder h400" data-stat-type="media" data-stat-value="60632163338846f1cdd1d02a"><div id="media-right"></div><script>M.fn.callAd('media-right', 'create', {p1:'bsmxa',p2:'fckv'}, {p1:'ctqyr',p2:'fckv'});</script></div></section><section class="section section-media" style="" data-column-place="C2P2" data-bid="651fda3050241b0ddbdb170a" data-ab-group="default"><div class="placeholder h100" data-stat-type="media" data-stat-value="6194d04a5e2e9c313595575d"><div id="article-teaser-right"></div><script>(function (w, n, c) {
    	w.yaContextCb.push(function () {
    		Ya.adfoxCode[n]({
    			ownerId: 235076,
                containerId: c,
                params: {
                    'p1': 'bwiwo',

                    document.getElementById(c).parentNode.style.display = 'none'
